com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

Class OAuthRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stormpath.sdk.oauth.OAuthRequests

  • public final class OAuthRequests
extends Object
    Static utility/helper methods serving Grant Authentication Request Builders. For example, to construct a builder to create a OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication: 
     OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication request = OAuthRequests.OAUTH_PASSWORD_GRANT_REQUEST.builder()
      .setLogin(username)
      .setPassword(password)
      .build();
    or, to construct a builder for a Refresh Grant Authentication request: 
     OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthentication request = OAuthRequests.OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_REQUEST.builder()
      .setRefreshToken(refreshToken)
      .build();
    Since:
    1.0.RC7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IdSiteAuthenticationRequestFactory IDSITE_AUTHENTICATION_REQUEST
      Returns a new OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationFactory instance, used to construct IdSite Grant Authentication requests.
      static OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticationFactory OAUTH_BEARER_REQUEST
      Returns a new OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticationFactory instance, used to authenticate JWT Access Tokens.
      static OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthenticationFactory OAUTH_CLIENT_CREDENTIALS_GRANT_REQUEST
      Returns a new OAuthClientCredentialsRequestAuthenticatorFactory instance, used to construct Client Credentials Authentication requests.
      static OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationFactory OAUTH_PASSWORD_GRANT_REQUEST
      Returns a new OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationFactory instance, used to construct Create Grant Authentication requests.
      static OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticationFactory OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_REQUEST
      Returns a new OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticationFactory instance, used to construct Refresh Grant Authentication requests.
